#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define MAX 10000005
using namespace std;
 

 
int dp[11][4005],d[4005];
void solve()
{
	int sum,c,car,s;
	for(int i=0;i<10;i++)
	{
		dp[i][0]=1;
		dp[i][1]=i;
	}
	for(int i=0;i<4001;i++)
	{
		dp[1][i]=1;
		dp[0][i]=0;
	}
	dp[0][0]=1;
	for(int i=2;i<10;i++)
	{
		c=1;
		sum=0;
		d[c]=i;
		car=0;
		for(int j=2;j<4001;j++)
		{
			sum=0;
			for(int k=1;k<=c;k++)
			{
				//cout<<" "<<k<<" "<<d[k]<<" "<<i<<" "<<car<<endl;
				s=d[k]*i+car;
				sum+=(s%10);
				d[k]=s%10;
				car=s/10;
				//cout<<car<<endl;
			}
			if(car)
			{
				c++;
				d[c]=car;
				sum+=car;
			}
			dp[i][j]=sum;
			//cout<<endl<<j<<" "<<sum<<endl<<endl;
			car=0;
		}
	}
	
}
 
int main ()
{
	solve();
	int t,a,b;
	sc(t);
	for(int i=1;i<=t;i++)
	{
		sc(a);
		sc(b);
		printf("Case %d: %d\n",i,dp[a][b]);
	}
	return 0;
}
